text: Subsoil is a kind of soil that can be found under the initial layer of soil. It is composed of sand, silt, and clay. It is critical in tree anchorage, and because of water-logging it can help vegetation survive drought and such. It is important in respect to the foundation of structures and buildings. == Subsoil locations == Subsoil can be found in, but is not limited to: * United States * United Kingdom * India * Brazil * Oceans ==References== Category:Soil
title: Subsoil
